ClinicResource.title: Clinic Resource
ClinicResource.description: Represents a clinic in the system.

id.description: The unique identifier of the clinic.

city.description: The city where the clinic is located.

country_name.description: The name of the country where the clinic is located.

phone.description: The phone number of the clinic.

mobile.description: The mobile phone number of the clinic.

email.description: The email address of the clinic.

contact_person.description: The contact person of the clinic.

contact_phone.description: The contact phone number of the clinic.

contact_email.description: The contact email address of the clinic.

latitude.description: The latitude of the clinic location.

longitude.description: The longitude of the clinic location.

logo_image.description: The path to the logo image of the clinic.

categories.description: The categories associated with the clinic.
